code: import{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function MessageType1(){const[numbers,setNumbers]=useState("");const[result,setResult]=useState(null);const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const res=await fetch("http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/numbers/1",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({numbers:numbers})});const data=await res.json();setResult(data.hex_string);}catch(err){console.error("Error:",err);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container d-flex justify-content-center align-items-center min-vh-100",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card p-4 shadow-lg w-75",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-center mb-4",children:"Message Type 1"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mb-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Enter PRN mask for satellites (comma separated)",value:numbers,onChange:e=>setNumbers(e.target.value),className:"form-control",required:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-primary w-100",children:"Submit"})]}),result&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mt-4 p-3 bg-light border rounded",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"mb-0",children:["Hex String: ",result]})})]})});}export default MessageType1;
